subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: Center Jarret Stoll scored in overtime Sunday to lead Los Angeles to a 2-1 victory, eliminating Vancouver. Tyler Seguin scored 3 minutes 17 seconds into overtime and Boston beat Washington.
snippet: Center Jarret Stoll scored in overtime Sunday to lead Los Angeles to a 2-1 victory, eliminating Vancouver. Tyler Seguin scored 3 minutes 17 seconds into overtime and Boston beat Washington.
